message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of lossy compression of continuous sources, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The proposed construction of polar lattices involves quantization, which is a common technique in multimedia (cs.MM) and signal processing (cs.SI). The nesting structure of polar lattices also provides solutions for multi-terminal coding problems, which is a topic in distributed systems (cs.DS). Finally, the paper proposes a new method for achieving the rate-distortion bound, which is a fundamental concept in machine learning (cs.LG).
